name: Acheron's Gambit (theinfamousmrmeow)
description:
A Gruesome Dark Fantasy Experience

Most souls are ground into raw Anima or harvested for their Suffering when they enter the Abyss.

Some are interesting enough to become passing amusements for the Devil-Lords.

The most bloodthirsty and vicious killers become Gladiatrix in Abaddon's Arena-City.

For all the ages of mankind I have waited for one who could kill Beelzebub.

And now I have two.

Confront your outer demons with cold iron, gunpowder, and sorcery.  Paint the halls of Dis with demonic Ichor as you cleave and blast your way through the hordes that stand between you and dominion or obliteration of the Abyss.

  • A brutal Action-RPG, with heavy Roguelike influence.  Improve your Champion with game-changing Perks and Spells as you harvest your enemies.
  • Skill-based gameplay, with intense two-fisted melee combat.  Dual wield any weapons and cast cunningly vicious spells.
  • Procedurally generated Hellscapes:  the Abyss is ever shifting and no two terrains are alike.
  • Malevolent and crafty enemies, who interact with the world as you do.
  • Harrowing monster and environment designs, steeped in 80's horror and Gothic Fantasy alike.

The game is familiar enough to be intuitive to players, but with unique mechanics to master and offers different play styles for action-game fans or RPG players or a blend of the two.

This is it then.  Two Champions against all the Legions the Devil-Lords Command.  Acheron's Gambit.
